KU.name: KU
KU.description:
KU is the module/namespace used to contain all relevant classes, functions,
and properties of the KetteringJS library.

KU.Directory.name: KU.Directory
KU.Directory.description:
The directory class will allow the library to gather information
on faculty/staff members such as name, office, phone number, and email.

KU.Directory.Department.name: KU.Directory.Department
KU.Directory.Department.description: Holds the information for a Kettering department

KU.Directory.Contact.Info.name: KU.Directory.Contact.Info
KU.Directory.Contact.Info.description:
Contains information for a directory contact info message. Which is
generally just a plain message and a boolean for its font-weight bold.

KU.Directory.Contact.name: KU.Directory.Contact
KU.Directory.Contact.description: Holds all the information for a Kettering faculty/staff member.

KU.Events.name: KU.Events
KU.Events.description:
The events class contains properties and functions related to Kettering
University's events. It should provide an easy and structured 
access to the latest events on campus.

KU.Events.Event.name: KU.Events.Event
KU.Events.Event.description: Holds the detailed information about a Kettering event.

KU.Events.Caption.name: KU.Events.Caption
KU.Events.Caption.description: Holds all the basic information for a Kettering event.

KU.Library.name: KU.Library
KU.Library.description:
The library class will allow KetteringJS to gather information
on currently available books available at Ketterings Library!

KU.Library.Book.name: KU.Library.Book
KU.Library.Book.description: Contains information for a single Library book in Kettering's database.

KU.Library.SearchOption.name: KU.Library.SearchOption
KU.Library.SearchOption.description: Name value pair for a search option

KU.News.name: KU.News
KU.News.description:
The news class contains properties and functions related to Kettering
University's news articles. It should provide an easy and structured 
access to the latest news articles on campus.

KU.News.Article.name: KU.News.Article
KU.News.Article.description: Holds all the information for a Kettering news article.

KU.News.Caption.name: KU.News.Caption
KU.News.Caption.description: Holds all the very basic information for a Kettering news article.

KU.Student.BB.name: KU.Student.BB
KU.Student.BB.description: Child class of student to contain all Blackboard related functions and classes

KU.Student.BB.Contact.name: KU.Student.BB.Contact
KU.Student.BB.Contact.description: Holds the information for a Blackboard contact

KU.Student.BB.Grade.name: KU.Student.BB.Grade
KU.Student.BB.Grade.description: Holds all the information for a Blackboard grade

KU.Student.BB.Tree.name: KU.Student.BB.Tree
KU.Student.BB.Tree.description:
Holds all the folders and files within a single layer of a content tree
for a course.

KU.Student.BB.Folder.name: KU.Student.BB.Folder
KU.Student.BB.Folder.description:
Holds all the basic information for a folder on Blackboard and allows
its own menu tree to be downloaded.

KU.Student.BB.Item.name: KU.Student.BB.Item
KU.Student.BB.Item.description: Holds all the information for a content item on Blackboard!

KU.Student.BB.Course.name: KU.Student.BB.Course
KU.Student.BB.Course.description: Holds all the information for a course downloaded from Blackboard

KU.Transfer.name: KU.Transfer
KU.Transfer.description:
The transfer class will allow KetteringJS to gather information
on transferable courses to Kettering!

KU.Transfer.College.name: KU.Transfer.College
KU.Transfer.College.description: Contains information for a college able to transfer credits to Kettering!

KU.Transfer.Course.name: KU.Transfer.Course
KU.Transfer.Course.description: Contains information for a course which is transferable to Kettering!

classitems.description: Deobfuscate a message

params.name: message
params.description: - the string which needs to be deobfuscated

classitems.description: The name of the department in plain English.
classitems.name: name

classitems.description:
The value identifier of the department used with the directory API and
specifically the search method. This value is generally an int, but can
also be a string (e.g All)
classitems.name: valueId

classitems.description: The full name of the faculty/staff member.
classitems.name: fullName

classitems.description: Information on the directory contact. Unfortunately the information is unordered and unclassified so it can only exist for now as an array of strings. Usually the order is [department, tags, office, phone, email]. Important: this order is NOT guaranteed nor is it that each of these pieces will be available. *Note: the array type is KU.Directory.Contact.Info*.
classitems.name: info

classitems.description: The image url corresponding to the faculty/staff member.
classitems.name: imgUrl

classitems.description: Cancels the current search for the directory.
classitems.name: abort
example:
// Abort the latest search!
    KU.Directory.abort();

classitems.description: Searches through Kettering directory with the specified parameters.
classitems.name: search

params.name: firstName
params.description: - first name to search with

params.name: lastName
params.description: - last name to search with

params.name: ext
params.description: - extension to use in search

params.name: departmentId
params.description: - value identifier for a department used in search

params.name: successCallback
params.description: - Called after successful gathering of the search results. Function Header: void successCallback( KU.Directory.Contact[] items);

params.name: failureCallback
params.description: - Called after a failure at gathering the search results. Function Header: void failureCallback(String errMsg);

classitems.description: Gathers the next page of the latest search in the directory.
classitems.name: nextPage

params.name: successCallback
params.description: - Called after successful gathering of the search results. Function Header: void successCallback( KU.Directory.Contact[] items);

params.name: failureCallback
params.description: - Called after a failure at gathering the search results. Function Header: void failureCallback(String errMsg);

classitems.description: Gathers the previous page of the latest search in the directory.
classitems.name: previousPage

params.name: successCallback
params.description: - Called after successful gathering of the search results. Function Header: void successCallback( KU.Directory.Contact[] items);

params.name: failureCallback
params.description: - Called after a failure at gathering the search results. Function Header: void failureCallback(String errMsg);

classitems.description: Retrieves a list of valid departments available to search with.
classitems.name: getDepartments

params.name: successCallback
params.description: - Called after successful gathering of the list of departments. Function Header: void successCallback( KU.Directory.Department[] items);

params.name: failureCallback
params.description: - Called after a failure at gathering the list of departments. Function Header: void failureCallback(String errMsg);

classitems.description: Returns a list of valuable library options to search by.

    KU.Library.abort();

classitems.description:
The student class will allow KetteringJS to gather information
on a student at Kettering University through banner web and blackboard
First name of contact
classitems.name: firstName

classitems.description: Last name of contact
classitems.name: lastName

classitems.description: Email address of the contact (when available).
classitems.name: email

classitems.description: Title of grade
classitems.name: title

classitems.description: Grade as a letter, percent or raw number
classitems.name: grade

classitems.description: Points possible for the grade (when available).
classitems.name: pointsPossible

classitems.description: Due date for the assignment (when available).
classitems.name: dueDate

classitems.description: The date the grade was last updated (when available).
classitems.name: postedDate

classitems.description: Status the assignment (when available).
classitems.name: status

items

classitems.description: Meeting time for the course (e.g 3:35-5:40)

classitems.description: Gets the content tree for a course containing a list of folders and files.

params.name: failureCallback

classitems.description: Gets the entire class roster
classitems.name: getRoster

params.name: successCallback
params.description: - Called after the class roster has been downloaded. Function Header: void successCallback( KU.Student.BB.Contact[] contacts);

params.name: failureCallback

classitems.description: Downloads the current grades for a course
classitems.name: getGrades

params.name: successCallback
params.description: - Called after the course grades has been downloaded. Function Header: void successCallback( KU.Student.BB.Grade[] grades);

params.name: failureCallback
params.description: - Called if the course grades failed to download. Function Header: void failureCallback(String errMsg);

classitems.description:
Gets the content tree for a course containing a list of folders and files
based on a specified bbId and contentId. This is meant to be a generic function
used by KU.Student.BB.Course and KU.Student.BB.Folder.
classitems.name: retrieveContentTree

params.name: bbId
params.description: - blackboard course identifier

params.name: contentId
params.description: - blackboard folder identifier

params.name: successCallback
params.description: - Called after the content tree has been downloaded. Function Header: void successCallback( KU.Student.BB.Tree tree);

params.name: failureCallback
params.description: - Called if the content tree was failed to download. Function Header: void failureCallback(String errMsg);

classitems.description: Logs the user into blackboard
classitems.name: login

params.name: user
params.description: - the Kettering user Id

params.name: pass
params.description: - password used to login to blackboard

params.name: successCallback
params.description: - Called after successful login into blackboard. Function Header: void successCallback();

params.name: failureCallback
params.description: - Called after a failure at logging into blackboard. Function Header: void failureCallback(String errMsg);

classitems.description: Checks to see if browser has any user logged into Blackboard
classitems.name: checkLogIn

params.name: successCallback
params.description: - Called after login status is checked. Function Header: void successCallback(Boolean loggedIn);

params.name: failureCallback
params.description: - Called if the check failed to execute Function Header: void failureCallback(String errMsg);

classitems.description: Parses an html document to evaluate login status of Blackboard
classitems.name: isLoggedIn

params.name: dom
params.description: - jquery object to parse through

example:
// Check login
    var loggedIn = KU.Student.BB.isLoggedIn($(htmlStr));

classitems.description: Downloads the blackboard courses
classitems.name: downloadCourses

params.name: successCallback
params.description: - Called after courses are gathered. Function Header: void successCallback( KU.Student.BB.Course courses);

params.name: failureCallback
params.description: - Called after a failure at logging into either blackboard. Function Header: void failureCallback(String errMsg);
